text: The restaurant had amazing food but terrible service. I waited 45 minutes for my appetizer.
This product exceeded my expectations in every way. Highly recommend!
The movie was okay. Some parts were good but it felt too long overall.
I'm not sure how I feel about this restaurant. The pasta was decent but overpriced.
Absolutely terrible experience. The staff was rude and the food was cold. Never going back.
The hotel room was clean and the bed was comfortable. Location was perfect for sightseeing.
It works as described. Nothing special but gets the job done.
The customer service team was incredibly helpful when I had issues with my order.
